segments.text: That boy is about to fall off that stool, and the woman has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s stretching so far to reach those cookies, and the stool is already wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe he’s that reckless just for a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem to care that he’s about to take a tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, just drying those dishes like nothing’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I should probably stop them, but I don’t want to get in trouble either.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is going to tip any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he grabs those cookies fast before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to be a mess when that stool goes over.
segments.speaker: PAR
